name: Men's Tree Dasher Relay
description: Meet The Tree Dasher Relay — our laceless running shoe made from earth-friendly materials. Made from leftover stock yarns, each pair features slight variations in color for a one-of-a-kind design. Just slip ‘em on and get outside.

mens-tree-dasher-relay.description: Meet The Tree Dasher Relay — our laceless running shoe made from earth-friendly materials. Made from leftover stock yarns, each pair features slight variations in color for a one-of-a-kind design. Just slip ‘em on and get outside.

localizedDescription.en-US: Meet The Tree Dasher Relay — our laceless running shoe made from earth-friendly materials. Made from leftover stock yarns, each pair features slight variations in color for a one-of-a-kind design. Just slip ‘em on and get outside.
localizedDescription.ja-JP: 地球に優しい素材を使ったスリップオンのランニングシューズ、Tree Dasher Relayが新登場。製造過程で残った糸を有効活用して紡いだ素材のため、一つとして同じ色味が無い、ユニークなシューズです。
